reviewText: Yep.. you can go to the website and buy a copy of this movie for $20 right from the writer director or pay another ten bucks and get it autographed.  I have no idea how anyone has the stones to want $130 for a used copy.

Great movie for the nostalgia / hot rod history buff. Fairly predictable plot, and the characters, aside from Faith's amazing role, were pedestrian.  Loved the Bonniville shots and inclusion of the legond Gene Winfield.

I can't say enough good about this movie.  It is long, but once you get into it, you realize its a story spanning 50 years.  Though on the outside its about hot rods and the coolness that goes with it, you soon realize its at its heart a love story.  Movie covers love gained, love lost, finding your true love once again.  This movie really hits home...for guys and gals.  Faith did a great job writing, directing, and staring in this film as the woman who finds a long lost hotrod and tries to find the owner given clues hidden in the car.  An amazing story.  Well worth it.  I will note that you can buy this from Faith's website now.  Google her name and the movie.
